java.lang.Object

com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.ButtonBaseBuilder<B,BB>
Type Parameters:
B - the type of ButtonBase subclass to build
BB - the type of the builder subclass
Direct Known Subclasses:
ButtonBuilder, CheckBoxButtonBuilder, ToggleButtonBuilder
public abstract class ButtonBaseBuilder<B extends javafx.scene.control.ButtonBase,BB extends ButtonBaseBuilder<B,BB>> extends LabeledBuilder<B,BB>
An abstract base builder class for creating instances of ButtonBase subclasses. Provides a fluent API for configuring properties such as actions and bindings for the button.
